website_summaries.verdict: The Vicks SmartTemp is a useful Bluetooth thermometer that pairs with your smartphone and tracks temperatures in an app with graphs you can share with your doctor.
pros: Separate profiles for all family members

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Read reviews from app stores before leveraging.
customer_reviews.text: Can't even get the application (Android) to stay open enough to pair it. The application hasn't even been updated since August of 2015. Support is a joke. Took several emails to even explain to them ur isn't a hardware (thermometer) issue since I can't even begin to try to pair with it and takes readings yet. Had to tell them to go read the recent reviews (2.5 stars), others reported the same issue. I shouldn't have to tell them to read reviews for their own app. Got no more contact from then. App still crashes on loading and still no updates for it on the play store. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: POS, garbage, junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. My daughter was sick. I checked her temp with this and it said she had a temp on 107 degrees. I checked it again and it said 99.3 degrees. I checked a third time and it said 104 degrees. All within less than 5 minutes. Like I said, GARBAGE. Don't waste your time and money. Not to mention, when you need an accurate thermometer this POS will not be dependable. Keep searching for a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Suter Family

customer_reviews.title: App Not Updated for Android Does Not Sync With Note 10, 10+ or Pixel 4. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is worthless without the app, the app is worthless without updates. Enough said. Do not buy unless you really like returning items.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceOtter614

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Got this thermometer after a friend recommend it. We absolutely love it. The Bluetooth feature connects to my phone flawlessly each and every time and I love the app for noting everything that’s going on with my family. This is the thermometer everyone needs!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Danielle

customer_reviews.title: APP DOES NOT WORK WITH NEWEST ANDROID OS
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pixel 4 with the Android 10. I was able to install the app (which was last updated in 2015!!!!). Unfortunately, the thermometer won't pair with my phone; bluetooth menu doesn't even see it. (This isn't the only bluetooth device I have that lost compatibility with my OS). I did pair it with my iPad and it works great. It's a great thermometer and system and I love having the temp history and being able to see the ups and downs every day, especially with COVID. Just don't use it if you only have Android devices.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: I love that it shows the last readings and you can ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the temperature readings are not entirely accurate. I believe it to be a few tenths a degree lower than actual temperature. There doesn’t seem to be any way to calibrate it so you just have to remember that when taking your temperature. I love that it shows the last readings and you can create profiles for your whole household.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Linaman

customer_reviews.title: wildly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: first use, each illness, it will read 101. to 103.5. take it again immediately, without removing the thermometer, and it will go down a degree, and each subsequent time it will continue to drop--but never to an accurate reading. I almost had a heart attack when i took my 2-year old's axilary temp with it and it said 103.5. the app is great--but useless if the lowest temp you get is still 1-2 degrees higher than at the doc's office 10 minutes later.
customer_reviews.author: tam i am

customer_reviews.title: Broke after five weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thermometer -- when it works. I was using it two or three times a day to measure and track my temp during COVID-19. After about four weeks it got a bit flaky and unreliable. Then, about a week after the first flakiness, instead of the normal green light coming on to take my temperature, I started getting a red light. I changed the battery and it worked again for a few days, then the red light came on full time. I just changed the battery a second time and it worked for a couple of readings. I'll see how long it works this time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: WORST thermometer ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thermometer I’ve ever had. It constantly says inaccurate read. To expect a sick child to put a thermometer under their tongue 10 times before it actually reads a temperature is horrible!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful thermometer for digitally tracking temperature. This is most ideal for people who need to track temperature over time. I would not get it for someone who only wants a quick temp as you must connect it to a phone via bluetooth in order to know what the temperature reading is. LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: CAN NOT GET IT TO PAIR WITH PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions and it will not pair with my phone
customer_reviews.author: jennifer burr

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I keep losing these so this is my forth one. My son has a rare fever disease and this thermometer has made life so easy! I love having his fever log available at appts. I love that I can mark symptoms as needed, medication and any notes needed
customer_reviews.author: JNguyen

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing until I updated my phone but now it won't connect. Please fix the app so the thermometer can be used!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good for follow ups
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in the product, it didn’t work as flawlessly as expected. It’s still a neat thermometer especially or keeping the memory of temps and the ability to send the results to drs.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: When we got them the batteries were dead. After buying batteries we could not hook up to my note 10 phone. Thank good we have other phones to try. It works over all great other wise. I would not recommend this for anyone who has a note 10. I will not be recommending it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Danisha

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these thermometers. I used the first one for 6 months and absolutely loved it. It got to where the light would just turn red, so I ordered batteries for it, replaced the battery, and it still wouldn't work. I decided to order another one simply because I loved the first one while it actually worked. I have had the second one for 11 days and it's already doing the same thing. (I've changed the battery on this one also)
customer_reviews.author: Brandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't show temp on the item itself
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took a little longer than expected. I knew that it was a 'smart' thermometer to use with a phone app,but I had no idea that it still wouldn't show the actual temp taken at that time ON the thermometer. So, with that being said, be prepared to jump right into using the app when using it the first time or else you won't know what the actual temperature reading is until then.
customer_reviews.author: KHardy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Great price and I like how with the app it will save the save the kids temps. I have a profile for all four kids and I can add symptoms too. I like to go back and see the last time they had a fever or how high it was. Definitely a great gift for any new parent.
customer_reviews.author: MarnerFam5

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and I love how it tracks it on my phone. The only downside is you had to download the app to read the temp, it won't work if not.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great way to track daily use or multiple user temps. Sometimes a bit inaccurate, otherwise a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie M

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: So far great!! I was asked to evaluate accuracy, the only way I know how to do that easily, is to compare to food cooking thermocouple, having done that yet. Seems accurate to me!
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT SYNC TO BLUETOOTH
customer_reviews.text: Total and complete waste of money. No matter what I tried, this would not sync to my phone's bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Works Great if you have an old phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the begining of January and i would like to return it if possible. I have been unable to pair it with my phone. So i did some googling and since my Samsung S9 updated it will no longer pair because the Vicks app isnt updated. Its completely useless to me now. It worked great when it worked with my phone. Ive only had it a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. This thing barely works 10% of the time. Find a better product, you'll be happier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who don't like taking their temp
customer_reviews.text: Carry in my purse my kids don't like taking there temperature but because involves the phone and they can see it they like it. Wish it had a smiley and sad face though.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good product, only works with app
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because you don’t see the temp in the screen, only the app and you have to have your phone nearby and the app open to use. Otherwise works perfectly, god product.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few wireless thermometers and have to say this one works the best. Connects easily to both iphone and android. It also saves a number of past temperature readings so that you can import them if previously taken with a different device. Easy to set setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Miller

customer_reviews.title: WARNING DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: WARNING DOES NOT WORK . All these reviews must be fake, this doesn’t pair at all. Holding down the button is insanely hard. Just doesn’t work. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer reads extremely high compared to hospital grade thermometers (103 vs 98)!!! While taking temp, App will rise to a temp. Then final temp displayed on App is 3 -4 degrees higher. NOT ACCURATE
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with newer android phones
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could tell you more it seems like it would be such a great product but it does not work with newer android devices I have a galaxy s10+ and after talking with support I found out it won't connect to my phone because it was made for older devices
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: The product I received
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for one week. I replaced the battery and still unusable. I requested a refund and haven’t heard from the company. What a waste of money. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: victoria anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is a Useless thermometer, if your child moves
customer_reviews.text: This is a Useless thermometer, if your child moves, even slightly during a reading it registers as an invalid measurement and you have to wait 8 seconds to take another reading. After attempting to get a rectal reading 10 times in a row and my sick kid screaming her head off I gave up and bought a different thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: frank taryla

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer but it's not compatible with the new updated Android yet
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Sutter

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WIT ANDROID
customer_reviews.text: This device works great with iOS, but the Android App will not work. I'm not sure how they can sell a product that has an Android app that doesn't work. I've tried it on 3 different versions of Android and none of them work. Only get this if you have iOS.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Trego

customer_reviews.title: Returned product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to connect or work. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: amie

customer_reviews.title: Techno thermometer amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best thermometer for a family works great with I phone for keeping track of fevers
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barrineau

customer_reviews.title: Glad it was cheap
customer_reviews.text: It required pairing for every reading. I tried to use in on an iPhone 10, 8s and iPad Pro and none of the pairings would stick.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Geffs

customer_reviews.title: Love this thermometer and app
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer and app. I purchased this after having purchased the kinsa and I like this one so much better!!! The app is super easy to use and I don't mind not having the temp read out on the thermometer itself.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE EDWARDS

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to it, its kind of neat having a log of your temps.
customer_reviews.author: Bar Guy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: While a bluetooth tracking thermometer is a great idea, the readings are totally inacurate. This thermometer will cause you to think your condition is much worse than it is. My core body temp usually runs a little lower than 98.6F. When two other thermometers read 97.8F, this thermometer read 100.5F.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay & Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thermometer ever! I love the app. It saves all your temps and you can set up different profiles for multiple children!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Brookshire

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Order two and the thermometer are turning yellow. this must be old. i ask for 2 new ones those also came yellow and the box was filthil.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Kunik

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Works well! I can't believe all the features for the price. Works will with my iPhone 6 on iOS 9.3.3. Seems pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Dead Battery
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, but with DOA battery, trip to Target and a $7 2 pack it works great
customer_reviews.author: P.L. Tadlock

customer_reviews.title: Works with HealthKit
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and seems accurate AND I inputs the temp into your iPhone HealthKit
customer_reviews.author: RHB

customer_reviews.title: Parent’s Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great that you can track temps on your phone!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked twice now it dosent even want to work. 🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Williams

customer_reviews.title: Does not pair. Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: Refuses to pair with ANY DEVICE! Complete waste of money. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work without App and App is not working well.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great tracking for drs!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! The only downfall is that it must be synced to your phone or something to get the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Austin

customer_reviews.title: But if that wasn't bad enough the thing that pisses me off is that ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to pair it up just right to get it to work. But if that wasn't bad enough the thing that pisses me off is that when I try to upload my picture for my profile it wouldn't let me it only let me upload a sixteen-year-old picture of myself that I had scan to my phone. As you see in the picture I submitted this is what happened whenever I try to upload a recent picture of myself that I took with my Galaxy S8 phone
customer_reviews.author: Richard Simon Mendez

customer_reviews.title: great variance in temps taken within a minute of each
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, great variance in temps taken within a minute of each other
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Diesnt seem accurate. I habe a vicks speed read ...
customer_reviews.text: Diesnt seem accurate. I habe a vicks speed read and this one never reads the same as that one.
customer_reviews.author: Gena L Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't write data to Apple Health
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the value of a bluetooth-enabled thermometer if you can't store the data somewhere useful -- like the Apple Health (aka HealthKit) that was designed for this purpose. Apparently you can only store data in their buggy app made by a company called "Kaz" with a kind of scary privacy policy (especially given that it's handling HEALTH data). If they'd make this compatible with Apple Health it would be a pretty useful little gadget. As it is, it's a vaguely concerning waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased except one issue...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Vicks Bluetooth thermometer I purchased. The first one I used for several months and was pleased with it. Then, it quit working. I assumed it was the battery. I replaced the battery but it still didn’t work. So, I bought a new thermometer. Just received it today. I paired with my iPhone and was checking the settings and discovered that the battery in this thermometer is at 62%. That is very disappointing given that it’s a brand new thermometer. Excepting for that low battery issue, I like the ease of use of this Vicks Bluetooth Thermometer and how it can keep a record of each temperature check with date and time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia W Frances

customer_reviews.title: Blu tooth rules!
customer_reviews.text: This fits in perfectly with my all blu tooth medical vitals setup I have going where I can now weigh myself, take my blood pressure, temperature & monitor my blood oxygen content via different apps & gadgets, but all record to the Apple health app. I can view everything in that app and print or email my reports to take to my doctor anytime I want via the other apps, and it all only takes a matter of seconds! The thermometer, as near as I can tell, seems accurate enough, but I love the blu tooth feature as I’m a bit of a techy and am always looking for apps and gadgets to make my life simpler 😃👍🏻Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Fatty McButterpants71

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!
customer_reviews.text: I use this digital, bluetooth enabled thermometer every day, usually 2x a day and it's been great! It's easy to use, and fast. It gives me a reading in about 5 seconds. Can't beat that. The smart phone app is super easy to setup and use. I like how I can track my temp over time and how I can add notes so I can recall what I was doing right before I checked it. Awesome little device
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very handy with pre tween athlete.
customer_reviews.text: With a young athlete who decided to play soccer I enrolled him in heat monitoring program that makes it necessary to weigh him, monitor his urine as well as get an accurate temperature the morning of a game and the same after the game. To be able to get a fast temperature more than one way helps. Got two and clearly marked one with an R so there are no mixups.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: App Required for Use is Outdated/Not Supported
customer_reviews.text: The product is outdated to the point of today's Android operating system being too advanced for the app, therefore the product is unusable. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Affordable choice, no regrets
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! The setup is effortless. It takes temperatures quickly. I wasn’t sure that I needed a thermometer that had an app, however it’s so nice to have temps and times logged. Especially when you have a sick child and are sleep deprived. Sometimes remembering temps and times is not as easy as one would think. Even if you use the thermometer without the app you can tell by the color illuminated if there is a fever present.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to get a rectal temperature.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second thermometer when my son's Drs office began asking for rectal temperatures (a study they were doing). This thermometer not only has a rectal mode, but it only takes eight seconds to get a reading. It's also reasonably comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DroidDevModder

customer_reviews.title: APPLE HEALTH App compatible
customer_reviews.text: IF ONLY you could silence the annoying "beeps"... other than that, this is the perfect product to have for monitoring temperature digitally with an App and recording it on your iPhone/Apple HealthKit...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sartori (fka Gaedeke)

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked with Andorid
customer_reviews.text: I think their app is outta date and would not load on my pixel 3. I also have an Ipad and luckily the apple app was working better so it is functional. Wish they would keep the software up to date or this might be useless soon.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lewitter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I use it with Apple health. Every morning I take my temp, and now I have a log over time. It’s very easy to use. If the reading is really strange, just tell it to take a second try. That seams to work.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mackay

customer_reviews.title: No reading from thermometer, you need the app.
customer_reviews.text: You can take your temperature up to 10 times and store it on the thermometer before you open the app and it will pull in all that data. The thermometer is fast.
customer_reviews.author: Pancho Cole

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that you can put in profiles for ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long but it works and is compatible with most Android phones. I like the fact that you can put in profiles for each individual and track their temps. Very simple to use but have to pair it with a phone or tablet-IPhone or Android. It is not a stand alone thermometer. You can only view your temp with the app, but then I knew this when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert55

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Loved the fact that it keeps track of the temperatures on my phone. I was able to show my child's doctor the recorded temps.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Woodall-Luten

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to use keeps track of all temperature readings ... absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to pair.
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to pair with phone at all. Also came dead so needed to replace battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for tracking!
customer_reviews.text: Easy app download and love the ability to track temp, meds and symptoms
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Fast Reading
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer. I take my son's temp rectally, and this thermometer has a quick reading. There's an app to download which makes keeping track of temp history easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific price, easy to pair, keeps track of temps on fone.
customer_reviews.author: GSMOBILE

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Highly portable. I like the app that you can download for free in the App Store. It’s great for tracking temperatures for yourself or any one you make a profile for.
customer_reviews.author: Delia S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It gives a very fast result on taking temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Danny E. Gallups

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect with new Android update.
customer_reviews.text: It was a hard setup at first, worked for a while but now will not work with the latest android update and there has been no update for the app. The thermometer will not connect now.
customer_reviews.author: L. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to sync with iPhone, just follow instructions. Seems as accurate as manual thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: DrTigger

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thermometer. The app that comes with it makes my life easier. I use it for my dogs, and it allows me to produce Excel or picture files with a graph of their readings. This one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Mclane

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Works reliably with the iPhone 7plus
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works reliably with the iPhone 7plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Z.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Temp seems pretty accurate and it takes it very quicky. App works good. Replaceable battery.
customer_reviews.author: LovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good but doesn't always stay paired to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: milphojo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to check to see if you have a fever or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tachibana

customer_reviews.title: Although it looks and seems cool with the app integration--I needed to track my temp ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this. Although it looks and seems cool with the app integration--I needed to track my temp almost hourly over the course of several days--it's readings are all over the map. It tends to measure way too hot. Well if it's a thermometer you are relying on for critical measurements what good is it if those measurements are off by several degrees?
customer_reviews.author: E. Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer yet!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer! Got this to replace my KINSA. I like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: Salt Life

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and super helpful for tracking my fertility as ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and super helpful for tracking my fertility as well as keeping track of my husband and son's temps. Easy app and quick readings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vicks Smart Temp Wireless Smartphone Thermometer 1 ea Smart Thermometer for Kids or Adults, for Rectal, Oral or Underarm Use, Free Downloadable App Tracks Fevers and Flu Symptoms
product_meta.description: The Vicks SmartTemp Thermometer and downloadable app make it easy to take and track temperature readings for the entire family. The thermometer uses Bluetooth technology to wirelessly connect to your smartphone, delivering the large digital readout on your phone screen.
feature_bullets: VICKS SMART TEMP WIRELESS THERMOMETER: Vicks wireless thermometer connects to your smartphone & records temperatures in the app. Get accurate temperature readings in 8 seconds with this smart thermometer that can be used orally, rectally, or under arm.

SMART THERMOMETER: Track temperature readings and fevers for the whole family with Vicks smart thermometer and free app. Make a profile for each adult and child in your home and track temperatures, symptoms, medication and dosage information in one place.

VICKS THERMOMETERS: Vicks helps you help your family feel better and get healthy during a cold or the flu. While humidifiers, vaporizers, NyQuil, DayQuil, VapoRub and other cold and flu medications help relieve symptoms, thermometers help you track them.

VICKS FOR FLU SEASON: A fever can be a symptom of many sicknesses, including colds or ear infections, & fevers are also symptoms of the flu, common in the colder months. A fever can be one of the first signs of sickness, especially in babies & children.
THE MOST USED THERMOMETERS BY PEDIATRICIANS: Your family's health is important to you & Braun makes digital thermometers you can rely on.
